_comment: Created by EFisher on 03/12/2015 13:07:55 using v2.7
title: How has the rate of VTE risk assessment changed?
analysis_commentary: There has been an increase in the proportion of admissions assessed for VTE risk across all types of provider of NHS-funded acute care from 2010/11 Q1. They have differing start points but converge to a common level of performance. In 2015/16 Q1, the proportion of admissions receiving a VTE assessment was 96.0% in acute providers and 98.9% in independent sector providers.
